mainboard.name: Greta, Sweettooth Scourge
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Greta, Sweettooth Scourge enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
{G}, Sacrifice a Food: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice a Food: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

mainboard.name: Beast Within
mainboard.oracle_text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

mainboard.name: Quillspike
mainboard.oracle_text: {B/G}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from a creature you control: Quillspike gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Overgrown Tomb
mainboard.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {B} or {G}.)
As Overgrown Tomb enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

mainboard.name: Tezzeret, Betrayer of Flesh
mainboard.oracle_text:
The first activated ability of an artifact you activate each turn costs {2} less to activate.
+1: Draw two cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.
−2: Target artifact becomes an artifact creature. If it isn't a Vehicle, it has base power and toughness 4/4.
−6: You get an emblem with "Whenever an artifact you control becomes tapped, draw a card."

mainboard.name: Woodland Cemetery
mainboard.oracle_text:
Woodland Cemetery enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Forest.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

mainboard.name: Choked Estuary
mainboard.oracle_text:
As Choked Estuary enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Island or Swamp card from your hand. If you don't, Choked Estuary enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

mainboard.name: Black Sun's Zenith
mainboard.oracle_text: Put X -1/-1 counters on each creature. Shuffle Black Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

mainboard.name: The Goose Mother
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
The Goose Mother enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
When The Goose Mother enters the battlefield, create half X Food tokens, rounded up.
Whenever The Goose Mother attacks, you may sacrifice a Food. If you do, draw a card.

mainboard.name: Master of Etherium
mainboard.oracle_text:
Master of Etherium's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.
Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

mainboard.name: Gruff Triplets
mainboard.oracle_text:
Trample
When Gruff Triplets enters the battlefield, if it isn't a token, create two tokens that are copies of it.
When Gruff Triplets dies, put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to its power on each creature you control named Gruff Triplets.

mainboard.name: Lodestone Myr
mainboard.oracle_text:
Trample
Tap an untapped artifact you control: Lodestone Myr gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Woodland Champion
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever one or more tokens enter the battlefield under your control, put that many +1/+1 counters on Woodland Champion.

mainboard.name: Disfigure
mainboard.oracle_text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Marsh Flats
mainboard.oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Marsh Flats: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Devoted Druid
mainboard.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {G}.
Put a -1/-1 counter on Devoted Druid: Untap Devoted Druid.

mainboard.name: Persist
mainboard.oracle_text: Return target nonlegendary creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.

mainboard.name: Spider Food
mainboard.oracle_text: Destroy up to one target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying. Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

mainboard.name: Ravenous Squirrel
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever you sacrifice an artifact or creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Ravenous Squirrel.
{1}{B}{G}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

mainboard.name: Drowned Catacomb
mainboard.oracle_text:
Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

mainboard.name: Utopia Sprawl
mainboard.oracle_text:
Enchant Forest
As Utopia Sprawl enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Whenever enchanted Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of the chosen color.

mainboard.name: Ulcerate
mainboard.oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You lose 3 life.

mainboard.name: Infernal Grasp
mainboard.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. You lose 2 life.

mainboard.name: Breeding Pool
mainboard.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {G} or {U}.)
As Breeding Pool enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

mainboard.name: Ignoble Hierarch
mainboard.oracle_text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}.

mainboard.name: Necroblossom Snarl
mainboard.oracle_text:
As Necroblossom Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Swamp or Forest card from your hand. If you don't, Necroblossom Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

mainboard.name: Feed the Cauldron
mainboard.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less. If it's your turn, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

mainboard.name: Sanguine Bond
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.

mainboard.name: Mulldrifter
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards.
Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

mainboard.name: Arbor Elf
mainboard.oracle_text: {T}: Untap target Forest.

mainboard.name: Watery Grave
mainboard.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)
As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

sideboard.name: Puncture Blast
sideboard.oracle_text:
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Puncture Blast deals 3 damage to any target.

sideboard.name: Jolrael, Mwonvuli Recluse
sideboard.oracle_text:
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 2/2 green Cat creature token.
{4}{G}{G}: Until end of turn, creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

sideboard.name: Reclamation Sage
sideboard.oracle_text: When Reclamation Sage enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

sideboard.name: Panharmonicon
sideboard.oracle_text: If an artifact or creature entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

sideboard.name: Bloodsoaked Champion
sideboard.oracle_text:
Bloodsoaked Champion can't block.
Raid — {1}{B}: Return Bloodsoaked Champion from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only if you attacked this turn.

sideboard.name: Turn to Mist
sideboard.oracle_text: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

sideboard.name: Throne of the God-Pharaoh
sideboard.oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses life equal to the number of tapped creatures you control.

sideboard.name: Scavenger Drake
sideboard.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenger Drake.

sideboard.name: Delay
sideboard.oracle_text: Counter target spell. If the spell is countered this way, exile it with three time counters on it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of its owner's upkeep, they remove a time counter. When the last is removed, they may play it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)

sideboard.name: Treasure Cruise
sideboard.oracle_text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Draw three cards.

sideboard.name: Bone Shards
sideboard.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or discard a card.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

sideboard.name: Vines of Vastwood
sideboard.oracle_text:
Kicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} as you cast this spell.)
Target creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control this turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

sideboard.name: Winds of Rebuke
sideboard.oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Each player mills two cards.

sideboard.name: Languish
sideboard.oracle_text: All creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn.

sideboard.name: Stitch Together
sideboard.oracle_text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Threshold — Return that card from your graveyard to the battlefield instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

sideboard.name: Wickerbough Elder
sideboard.oracle_text:
Wickerbough Elder enters the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.
{G}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Wickerbough Elder: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
